ing: 1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes in juice
n: Quick and Easy Cream of Tomato Soup
des: "This quick and easy cream of tomato soup is a great way to use up last season's canned tomatoes."
ins: Simmer diced tomatoes in juice in a saucepan over low heat until hot, 7 to 10 minutes. Add baking soda and let the mixture foam. Stir tomato soup, parsley, sugar, margarine, chicken base, and white pepper into the tomato mixture; cook until hot, about 5 minutes. Pour milk into tomato mixture and stir; cook until hot, about 5 minutes.
